Metadata.title: Telrchat
Metadata.description: This chat service encrypts messages before sending them. Even if the content is leaked externally, it cannot be viewed without decrypting the information. Thanks to this feature, we have achieved a highly confidential private chat service.

title.1: Realize a Chat App with Encrypted and

HeroTitle.subtitle: Messages are encrypted and automatically deleted within 24 hours.

HeroSubContent.message: This chat service encrypts messages before sending them. Even if the content is leaked externally, it cannot be viewed without decrypting the information. Thanks to this feature, we have achieved a highly confidential private chat service.

HeroGoogleGeminiEffect.title: Private Chat App
HeroGoogleGeminiEffect.description: Messages are encrypted before being sent, protecting the privacy of both the sender and receiver.

HeroTimeline.title: Journey Timeline
HeroTimeline.description: It has been a year since Telrchat began. Below is the timeline of this app's journey.

2024.1: The development of Telrchat was started by a single developer.

1.title: Does it cost money to use?
1.description: No, you can use it completely for free.

2.title: When will the sent messages be deleted?
2.description: Messages will be automatically deleted within 24 hours of being sent.

3.title: Do I need to register an account?
3.description: Yes, you need to register and log in to an account.

4.title: Are there any usage restrictions?
4.description: Yes, while there are no limits on messages, there is a limit on the number of groups you can create.
